title: Workforce Planning for Solar Farm Construction
description: A project manager needs to create a workforce plan for the construction phase of a 150 MW solar farm.

tasks.description: Break down the construction project into major phases (e.g., site prep, racking installation, panel mounting, electrical work).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed project phase list.

tasks.description: Estimate the number and type of workers (e.g., laborers, electricians, operators) required for each phase.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a detailed staffing requirement table.

tasks.description: Develop a hiring schedule to ensure the right workers are available at the right time, aligned with the project timeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a Gantt chart for workforce ramp-up and ramp-down.
